name: Tomato Timer
description: A classic tomato-shaped timer to keep your Pomodoro sessions on track.

name: Focus Flask
description: A magical flask that boosts your focus and concentration during work intervals.

name: Task Tracker Notebook
description: A beautifully crafted notebook that helps you track your tasks and progress.

name: Productivity Hourglass
description: An hourglass that flows with golden sand to signify the precious time of each Pomodoro session.

name: Concentration Candle
description: A scented candle that enhances your concentration and creates a calming work environment.

name: Energy Elixir
description: A potion that revitalizes you during breaks, ensuring you stay energetic and focused.
